```{r}
library(conflicted)
library(ggdag)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r dpi=600, width=6, height=6}
dagify(c ~ a,
       f ~ c,
       a ~ d,
       c ~ d,
       f ~ d,
       d ~ b + g,
       b ~ e) |>
  ggdag() +
  theme_dag()
```


```{r dpi=600, width=3, height=3}
dagify(Y ~ X) |>
  ggdag_equivalent_dags() +
  theme_void()
```




```{r fig.height=8, fig.width=8, dpi=600}
dagify(out   ~ med + treat,
       med   ~ treat,
       exposure = "treat", outcome = "out") |>
  ggdag_equivalent_dags() +
  theme_void()
```
